questions.question: Which of the following activities involve a type of digital media? (more than 1 correct answer)

choices.answer: Sending a text message to a friend

questions.question: People use the term "24/7" to describe digital media because:

choices.answer: This type of media is available 24 hours a day 7 days a week
Password with 24 letters and 7 numbers is needed
There are 24 different kinds of digital media

questions.question: When digital media is described as being interactive, this means:

choices.answer: People can make friends on the Internet

questions.question: An upstander is someone who:

choices.answer: Takes action and stands up for someone who is being bullied
Goes along with what a cyberbully is doing
Ignores what a cyberbully is doing

questions.question: "That must make you feel awful" and "Do you want to talk about it" shows empathy; True or False
A classmate keeps posting rude comments about your friend. How can you become an upstander?

choices.answer: Ask classmate to delete the posts

questions.question: A player sends you hurtful "smack talk" while online gaming, This is cyberbulling True or False
Cyberbullying? Altering photos of friends in a goofy way, but not in a mean way
Cyberbulling? Making a physical threat online
Cyberbulling? Telling someone you "like" them online
Cyberbulling? Physically pushing someone
Cyberbulling? Saying something mean about someone based on their race, gender, or religion
Which one would be considered flaming?
Is it okay to meet, someone you meet online, in person by yourself?
Which question should you NOT answer if some asks you online?

choices.answer: What bands do you like the most?
Will you promise to keep our friendship secret?
Isn't cool that we like the same TV shows?

questions.question: True or False: Flirting with somebody you meet online is safe, as long as you are in control
Which of the following is an example of a RISKY way to present oneself online?

choices.answer: An avatar with pink hair, even though your hair is brown
Lying to someone online and saying your in college

questions.question: Pretending to being someone else online and posting messages that make that person look bad is
True / False: Your digital footprint is all the information about you online that only you post
What kinds of information can make up a digital footprint?

choices.answer: Comments that others post about you

questions.question: What kinds of information would make a POSITIVE digital footprint?

choices.answer: A newspaper article about your soccer team
A mean comment that you made on a friend's website
A blog you created to showcase your artwork
Inappropriate photos of you on a social network site

questions.question: A type of crime in which your private information is stolen and used for criminal activity:
Sara finds a message on her phone that she thinks might be a scam. Sara should:

choices.answer: Forward the message to her friends
Reply and ask the sender not to send more mail

questions.question: Which answer is a warning sign that a website might NOT have trustworthy information?

choices.answer: Information comes from the site of a well-known newspaper
It is not clear who the author is

questions.question: Everything you read online has been put there by people who know what they are talking about:
What does the word "gender" mean?

choices.answer: The character that someone plays in a virtual world
Common ideas about how boys and girls should look and act
Biological differences between boys and girls
